mapper.select: SELECT SN, UUID, FILE_SN fileSn, FILE_NM fileNm, FILE_COURS fileStreCours, FILE_TYPE fileType, UPDT_DT updtDt, FILE_SIZE fileSize, USEYN useYn FROM FILE_READER_WRITE WHERE USEYN='Y' AND UUID = #{uuid} ORDER BY SN DESC

SELECT A.SN, A.UUID, A.FILE_SN, A.FILE_NM, A.FILE_COURS, A.FILE_TYPE, A.UPDT_DT, A.FILE_SIZE, A.USEYN, B.STRE_FILE_NM, B.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM FILE_READER_WRITE A JOIN FILE_DETAIL_INFO B ON (A.FILE_SN = B.FILE_SN) WHERE USEYN='Y' AND UUID = #{uuid} AND A.FILE_SN = #{fileSn} ORDER BY SN DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FILE_READER_WRITE WHERE UUID = #{uuid} AND FILE_SN = #{fileSn}
